task.title: Calculating time
task.shortdesc: This topic describes how to use the World Time Pro to add, subtract, multiply and divide units of time.

taskbody.context:
This procedure explains how to use the World Time Pro to perform simple calculations on units of time. For example, you may be managing a two-day sporting event, and need to add two times together to find a competitor's total time. Using the World Time Pro ensures you can quickly and accurately calculate the competitor's total time. If you need to use the result of a calculation in another calculation, click Pass Value. This button copies the values in the
result fields to the upper row of entry fields.

step.cmd: In the main calculation pane, type the first time in your equation in the upper row of entry fields.

step.stepresult: If you click muliply or divide, the lower row of entry fields are replaced with the Constant field.

step.cmd: Type the time to add or subtract, or the number to multiply or divide by, into the lower row of entry fields.

info.note: You must click an operation button before typing numbers in the lower row of entry fields. Clicking an operation button deletes all values in the lower row of entry fields.

taskbody.result: The result of your calculation appears in the result fields.
taskbody.example:
For example, to add 3 hours 30 min 43 sec and 4 hours 38 min 13 sec, type 3 30 43 in the upper row of entry fields, click Plus, type 4 38 13 in the lower row of entry fields and click
Equals. The result of 8 hours 8 min 56 sec appears in the result fields.
